Key Match Events: Miguel Vargas collided with Andrew Benintendi while trying to catch a fly ball, leading to his injury and exit from the game.
Grady Sizemore and Andrew Benintendi were ejected by the umpire after arguments during the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Miguel Vargas left the game with an abrasion on his right eye after the collision.
Grady Sizemore and Andrew Benintendi were ejected during the game, reflecting on the team's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles scored four more runs in the inning following the defensive blunder.
The loss brought the White Sox's season record to 109 wins, close to the 1962 Mets' record.
